          <title>
            <string language="sl">Delec v homogenem polju</string>
            <string language="en">Particle in Homogeneous Field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikel in homogenem Fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Particule dans le domaine homogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Partícula no campo homogêneo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Particella nel campo omogeneo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόριο στο ομοιογενές πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Partícula en campo homogéneo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Gibanje pozitivno naelektrenega delca na katerega deluje rotacijska električna sila in pravokotno nanj magnetno polje.</string>
            <string language="en">Trajectory of positively charged particle in homogeneous magnetic and electric field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naboj</string>
            <string language="en">charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flugbahn des positiv belasteten Partikels in 
homogenem magnetischem und elektrisch fangen auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trajectoire de particule franchement chargée 
dans le champ magnétique et électrique homogène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trajectory da partícula positivamente carregada 
no campo magnético e elétrico homogêneo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Traiettoria della particella positivamente 
caricata nel campo elettrico magnetico ed omogeneo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροχιά του θετικά χρεωμένου μορίου στο ομοιογενές 
μαγνητικό και ηλεκτρικό πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trayectoria de la partícula positivamente 
cargada en campo magnético y eléctrico homogéneo.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
